Mobile.Crichton Leprechaun: The Crichton Leprechaun (known alternatively as the Mobile Leprechaun or Alabama Leprechaun) is an internet meme involving a purported leprechaun seen in a tree in Crichton, a neighborhood of Mobile, Alabama. The Crichton Leprechaun rose to international fame in March 2006 following a news report filed at local NBC affiliate WPMI-TV. The video was posted to YouTube on St. Patrick's Day 2006 and fueled media attention to the story and the city.
